next_id: the ruins can still provide powerful benefits for the holder. Different Ruins provide different benefits.

npc_content: However
next_id: please note that the start time of battle for Ruins will vary among the different Ruins. There's a limit on the number of Ruins of the same level you can hold

npc_content: Hey! The blue border around the Alliance Fortress is the Alliance Territory
next_id: and only your alliance members can move there.

npc_content: Our bases will gain exclusive buffs within the Territory
The more the better! With the help of your Alliance members you'll get rewards faster.
The more damage you deal in the Sandtable Exercise
next_id: the more rewards you'll receive! So think carefully about the hero and troop combination!!

npc_content: The opponents here are all elite commanders.
You can get inspired by new ideas for hero and unit combos
next_id: or just defeat them all and get the grand reward!
